message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for discussions.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and ultimately prove to be a wise investment.

Thank you for your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still constrained by my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1,000,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
